item.description:
Springfest at the Beach is a tasting of fine beers, imported and domestic, representing virtually every style, together with a chili tasting, live musical entertainment and the ambiance of Ocean Beach Park. Sponsored by the New London Rotary Foundation, Inc. No one under 21 admitted. Positive ID required. Produced by Gordon's Yellow Front Wines and Liquors, New London, CT 06320, home to over 1,000 beers. 860-912-0408

More info: www.newlondonrotary.org

group.name: New Haven Wine and Dining Meetup Group,

item.name: Springfest at the Beach "Beer Festival"
